page.title: 19INFANTS' WRITINGS
page.content:
"I WALK TO SCHOOL AND SOMETIMES I GO IN THE CAR WITH MUMMY AND DADDY.AFTER SCHOOL SOMETIMES WE GO SHOPPING WITH MUMMY AND ALASTAIR AND ME."
"I GO ON THE BUS TO SCHOOL AND IN THE WOODS I SAW A RABBIT AND I SAW A DEER AND ONCE I SAW HORSES."
"I WALK TO SCHOOL WITH MY DOG AND MY MUM AND ON THE WAY WE SEE BIRDS AND I SEE THE MINIBUS."
"I PLAY WITH MY SISTER AND BROTHER AT HOME AND MY MUM IS AT HOME AND MY DAD IS AT WORK."
"AT CUBS WE COOKED SAUSAGES ON A FIRE AND WE HAD TO COLLECT A LOT OF WOOD_IT HAD TO BE BROWN WOOD FOR GREEN WOOD MAKES A LOT OF SMOKE AND GETS IN YOUR EYES."
